r.s: The UNL HTML Templates as a PEAR Package.
r.d: This package allows you to render UNL Template styled pages using PHP Objects.
r.n:
Update .tpl cache so template files are in sync with latest wdntemplates. Allow underscores within Version3 template include files.
New templates!
* Fixed_html5 * Unlaffiliate
Template updates:
* Meta lang fixes * Remove IDM region from the secure template * Mobile template now supports navigation and move to HTML5
